name: Reframed
description: ReFramed is a badass, old-school FPS horror game set in the Solarix universe. Relive the terrors of Solarix in this high-octane, bullet spraying reimagining, only this time, stealth is not an option...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and above Processor: 3.0 GHz dual core or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with 512 MB video RAM or better (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5850) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 - 64-bit Processor: 2.4 GHz quad core or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with 1 GB video RAM or better (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / Radeon HD 7950) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
